mapper.select:
select ifnull(sum(drsd.svg_speed), 0) as avgSpeed, ifnull(sum(drsd.saved_money), 0) as totalMileage, ifnull(sum(drsd.mileage), 0) as svgSpeed, ifnull(sum(drsd.co2_increment), 0) as totalCo2, DATE_FORMAT(drsd.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as times from cor_driver_ride_stat_detail drsd where drsd.dr = 0 and drsd.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and drsd.driver_id = #{userId}
and (DATE_FORMAT(drsd.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(now(), INTERVAL 1 month), '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'))
and (DATE_FORMAT(drsd.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(#{dateTime} , INTERVAL 1 month),'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
group by times
